subject: Tax during purchase
description_text:
Hello,
I wanted to ask why, when I want to purchase for example plus x pedals,
there is nothing about an additional cost of tax, but when I change it to a
VAM 2 pack set it shows that I have to cover an additional cost. My
question is where does this come from and is there anything I can do about
it (for example wait for you to provide EU warehouses with them if that is
the case)? My address is in Poland for context.
Best regards
